text: Nassarius micans is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 18 mm and 24 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs in the Red Sea and off the Philippines and Indonesia. ==References== * Vine, P. (1986). Red Sea Invertebrates. Immel Publishing, London. 224 pp. * Cernohorsky W. O. (1984). Systematics of the family Nassariidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda). Bulletin of the Auckland Institute and Museum 14: 1–356. ==External links== * Category:Nassariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1852
title: Nassarius micans
